name: Immigrate to Mato Grosso do Sul
description: Mato Grosso do Sul is a Brazilian state in the Central-West Region, known for its vast area, Pantanal wetlands, ecotourism in Bonito, agriculture, and cattle-raising, with a warm climate and rich natural environment.
keywords: Mato Grosso do Sul, Pantanal, Bonito, Campo Grande, agriculture, cattle, ecotourism
